attributes.action: Save Hornby High School from threatened closure in July 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
LCC wants to close Hornby High School 
in July 2008
We say Selective Grammar Schools, Faith schools and huge Comprehensives are only part of the picture
• a small dedicated school can make a big difference to many children who would otherwise fail or fail to reach their full potential
• in a small school, every child is known to everyone and who they are really matters
• children of all ability levels thrive in small schools
• parents have the right to state their preferences in choosing a school– a small school should remain an option
• a small school can do big things

Pupils say:
“Hornby helped me to grow in confidence.”  
“The size of the school means that the teachers know what your capabilities are.”  “The school offers great education and a brilliant atmosphere.” “I didn’t want to go to any school but Hornby.”

Parents say:
“My children weren’t just a number on a register.”
“Our daughter has astounded us all by exceeding all expectations, due wholly to the high level of superb support she has received in this unique small school environment.”
Sign now to help protect the future of education for all in the Lune Valley and throughout the district.
